newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - HNC Software rated buy. [CORRECTED 20:45 GMT]
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - HNC Software rated buy. [CORRECTED 20:45 GMT]

text.p: --Rodman & Renshaw Inc said Tuesday it had initiated coverage of HNC Software Inc with a buy rating.
--It said the software company's earnings are expected to grow 146 percent in 1996 to $0.18, 175 percent in 1997 to $0.50 and 50 percent in 1998 to $0.75.
--Rodman's 12-month price target on HNC's stock is $38.
--HNC Software was trading at 30-3/8 (corrects from 38-3/8), up 3/8.
